reviewText: i have already seen the first movie in this series and loved it, this video does not live up to my expectations. its not that its bad just not what i expected. it definitely not for the casual viewer, some of the content is rather disturbing and disgusting

Would of been nice to know it was a poop fetish film.

This was the most disgusting anime movie I had ever watched.  Sex is one thing, which this movie had very little, but the depravity of eating someone else's s*** and drinking their urine is just about as sick as you can get.  I couldn't finish the movie it was just too sick.  I guess I am done with "Night Shift Nurses".  This is not what I call entertainment.
I would have to say "BUYER BEWARE".
The animation  and dubbing were firne theres plenty of sex scenes . the problem  is that there mostly scat scenes.
The movie was good.  The story was good also.  But, I only recommend this for adults.
